content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: ender_eye
inventory=[{"type": "iron_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 15, "index": 12}, {"type": "stone_button", "quantity": 38, "index": 13}, {"type": "orange_wool", "quantity": 4, "index": 16}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 19, "index": 18}, {"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 15, "index": 20}, {"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 59, "index": 24}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "spruce_fence_gate", "quantity": 5, "index": 26}, {"type": "splash_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "crimson_stairs", "quantity": 39, "index": 34}, {"type": "poisonous_potato", "quantity": 54, "index": 35}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 9, "index": 36}, {"type": "gold_nugget", "quantity": 49, "index": 39}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 2, "index": 40}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 41, "index": 41}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 38, "index": 45}]
thought: I need to craft an ender_eye, and I have all the ingredients. I will start by moving the ender_pearl from slot 22 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: ender_eye
inventory=[{"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 15, "index": 12}, {"type": "stone_button", "quantity": 38, "index": 13}, {"type": "orange_wool", "quantity": 4, "index": 16}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 19, "index": 18}, {"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 15, "index": 20}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 59, "index": 24}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "spruce_fence_gate", "quantity": 5, "index": 26}, {"type": "splash_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "crimson_stairs", "quantity": 39, "index": 34}, {"type": "poisonous_potato", "quantity": 54, "index": 35}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 9, "index": 36}, {"type": "gold_nugget", "quantity": 49, "index": 39}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 2, "index": 40}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 41, "index": 41}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 38, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I need to move the blaze_powder from slot 25 to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
act: move from slot 25 to slot 2 with quantity 1

act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
